metadata.description: Iron Man, Nova, and the Uncanny X-Men collide in this explosive cross-over! After Cyclops is kidnapped, Nova and Iron Man find themselves embroiled in a deep-space rescue mission alongside fugitive X-Men! Will this unlikely grouping of heroes cooperate long enough to save Cyclops? And just where will they find the X-Men's fearless leader?
metadata.name: Uncanny X-Men / Iron Man / Nova: No End In Sight
